name: NewStoreRequest
description: Submit a request to open a new CoffeeCorp store location, including details on location, staff, and inventory needs.

name: CoffeeBeanOrder
description: Place an order for coffee beans from a specific region or farm, specifying quantity and roast level.

name: EmployeeTrainingRequest
description: Request training for a new employee, including modules on coffee preparation, customer service, and point-of-sale operations.

name: Menu Item Proposal
description: Submit a proposal for a new menu item, including recipe, pricing, and marketing strategy.

name: StoreRemodelRequest
description: Request a remodel of an existing store, including updates to layout, decor, and equipment.

name: SupplyChainDisruptionNotification
description: Notify CoffeeCorp headquarters of a supply chain disruption, including details on affected products and expected resolution time.

name: CustomerComplaintResolution
description: Submit a resolution to a customer complaint, including details on the issue and steps taken to resolve it.

name: MarketingCampaignProposal
description: Submit a proposal for a new marketing campaign, including budget, target audience, and promotional materials.

name: InventoryAdjustmentRequest
description: Request an adjustment to inventory levels, including reasons for the adjustment and expected impact on sales.

name: PartnershipOpportunitySubmission
description: Submit a proposal for a partnership opportunity, including details on the partner organization and potential benefits to CoffeeCorp.
